Token.Abstract: The MBVariableSpace class is responsible for loading variable declarations from MBML files and for maintaining the current values of named Mockingbird variables across the lifetime of the application.
Retrieves the MBVariableSpace instance associated with the currently-active MBEnvironment.
Returns the current value for the variable with the given name using the keyed subscripting notation.

Parameter.Name: variableName
Parameter.Abstract: The name of the MBML variable whose value is to be retrieved.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The current variable value. Will return nil if there is no variable with the given name or if there was an error retrieving the variable's value.

Token.Abstract: Returns the current string value of the variable with the given name.

Parameter.Name: varName
Parameter.Abstract: The name of the variable whose string value is being retrieved.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The current string value of the variable. Will return nil if there is no variable with the given name or if there was an error retrieving the variable's value.

Token.Abstract: Returns the current string value for the variable with the given name, or a default value if there is no available variable value.

Parameter.Name: varName
Parameter.Abstract: The name of the variable whose string value is being retrieved.

Parameter.Name: def
Parameter.Abstract: A default value to return in cases where the method would otherwise return nil.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The current string value of the variable. Will return def if there is no variable with the given name or if there was an error retrieving the variable's value.

Token.Abstract: Sets a variable to the given value using the keyed subscripting notation.

Parameter.Name: value
Parameter.Abstract: The value to set for the variable named variableName.

Parameter.Name: variableName
Parameter.Abstract: The name of the variable whose value is to be set. If the name represents a read-only variable, the call will be ignored and an error will be logged to the console.

Token.Abstract: Pushes a new value onto the stack for the variable with the given name.

Parameter.Name: variableName
Parameter.Abstract: The name of the variable whose value is to be set. If the name represents a read-only variable, the call will be ignored and an error will be logged to the console.

Parameter.Name: value
Parameter.Abstract: The value to set for the variable named variableName.

Token.Abstract: Pops the current value from the stack for the variable with the given name. (The value of the variable prior to the previous call to pushVariable:value: will be restored.)

Parameter.Name: varName
Parameter.Abstract: The name of the variable whose value is to be set. If the name represents a read-only variable, the call will be ignored and an error will be logged to the console.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The value of the variable varName that was popped from the stack. If there were no stack values for the variable, nil will be returned.

Token.Abstract: Sets the value of a given key for the type="map" variable with the specified name. (This method will also operate on any variable whose value is of type NSDictionary.)

Parameter.Name: varName
Parameter.Abstract: The name of the map variable whose key-value is being set. If the name represents a read-only variable, the call will be ignored and an error will be logged to the console.

Parameter.Name: key
Parameter.Abstract: The map key whose value is being set.

Parameter.Name: val
Parameter.Abstract: The new value for the given key. If nil, the value for key will be removed.

Token.Abstract: Sets the value of a given key for the type="list" variable with the specified name. (This method will also operate on any variable whose value is of type NSArray.)

Parameter.Name: varName
Parameter.Abstract: The name of the list variable whose index-value is being set. If the name represents a read-only variable, the call will be ignored and an error will be logged to the console.

Parameter.Name: idx
Parameter.Abstract: The list index whose value is being set. If idx is greater than the last index of the list, the list array will be expanded to include the new index, and any empty index slots will be filled with NSNull.

Parameter.Name: val
Parameter.Abstract: The new value to set at the given index. If nil, the value will be set as NSNull.

Token.Abstract: Removes the current value of the variable with the specified name. Values on the variable stack will not be affected.

Parameter.Name: varName
Parameter.Abstract: The name of the variable whose value is to be unset. If the name represents a read-only variable, the call will be ignored and an error will be logged to the console.

Token.Abstract: Constructs a string for a variable-related name with the given suffix.

Parameter.Name: name
Parameter.Abstract: The name to use for the root of the returned string. If nil, this method returns nil.

Parameter.Name: suffix
Parameter.Abstract: The optional suffix to apply to name. If nil, this method returns name.

ReturnValue.Abstract: If name and suffix are both non-nil, the concatenation of name, ":" and suffix is returned. Otherwise, the value of the name parameter is returned.

Token.Abstract: Determines whether the variable with the given name is a read-only variable.

Parameter.Name: varName
Parameter.Abstract: The name of the variable.

ReturnValue.Abstract: YES if the variable named varName is read-only; NO otherwise.

Token.Abstract: Programmatically declares a variable.

Parameter.Name: declaration
Parameter.Abstract: An MBVariableDeclaration representing the variable.

ReturnValue.Abstract: YES if the variable represented by declaration was successfully declared; NO if an error occured.

Token.Abstract: Returns the MBVariableDeclaration for the variable with the given name.

Parameter.Name: varName
Parameter.Abstract: The name of the variable whose declaration is being retrieved.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The declaration for varName, or nil if no declaration exists.

Token.Abstract: Programmatically declares an MBML function.

Parameter.Name: function
Parameter.Abstract: An MBMLFunction representing the function and its implementation.

ReturnValue.Abstract: YES if function was successfully declared; NO if an error occurred.

Token.Abstract: Returns the names of the currently-declared MBML functions.

ReturnValue.Abstract: An NSArray containing the names of the declared MBML functions.

Token.Abstract: Returns the MBMLFunction associated with the given name.

Parameter.Name: name
Parameter.Abstract: The name of the function whose MBMLFunction is sought.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The MBMLFunction, or nil if there is no function declared having the given name.

Token.Abstract: Adds an observer to be notified of changes to the value of the Mockingbird variable with the given NSUserDefaults key name.

Parameter.Name: userDefaultsName
Parameter.Abstract: The userDefaultsName of the variable to observe. Note that this is not necessarily the same as the variable name.

Parameter.Name: observer
Parameter.Abstract: The object to notify.

Parameter.Name: action
Parameter.Abstract: The method selector of observer to call when notifying.

Token.Abstract: Stops an observer from being notified of changes to the value of the Mockingbird variable with the given NSUserDefaults key name.

Parameter.Name: observer
Parameter.Abstract: The observer to remove.

Parameter.Name: userDefaultsName
Parameter.Abstract: The userDefaultsName of the variable to stop observing.
